name: Learn Professions!
description:
Fun and educational multi-language learning app for small children.

Learn professions is mean to be used by children together with their parents to encourage and support the learning process, however can be used by children without adult supervision as well.

Children can learn 24 unique professions from pictures and by their names. Learning experience is created by friendly and colorful pictures, vibration and sounds.

Application contains two modes:

- learning mode, where a child can learn professions

- quiz mode, where a child can ques which item is used in what profession

Content is localized in following languages: English, Lithuanian, French, German and Russian. Content language is managed from within the app, so multi-language learning experience is also available.

App contains advertisements (no explicit content).

App does not contain in-app purchases.

Learn professions app is a third product from the children education line by this developer. If you like it, please check the other products as well.

Developed by Lukas and Erika from EnL Design Studio
